name: MasterDocs
tagline: Generate your JAX-RS API documentation with style
body:
![masterdocs](http://s13.postimg.org/u0yds0dhz/masterdocs.png) ### MasterDocs. MasterDocs is a Java API documentation.
The main goal is to provide a unique static HTML5 page to display useful documentation about a Java API (using JAX-RS) without made any change into the code. ### How it works ? MasterDocs is a Maven plugin, so if your application doesn't use Maven, sorry you cannot use MasterDocs. Add in you pom.xml this plugin : ``` fr.masterdocs masterdoc-maven-plugin 1.2 install masterdoc com.masterdoc ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
